page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content:
{Bradley}people mostly use cars to travel to their destination.There is a bus that comes on Thursday to take people to shopping areas.Bicycles and motorbikes are also used for delivering newspapers.Some people use a lorry to get to work.Some people also walk for joy and pleasure. The{school}hires a bus to take the juniors swimming and also for other long journeys.If we want to go short distances, like for sports, we use cars offered by parents and teachers. The older children can catch a bus to {Queen Elizabeth Grammer School.}
By Claire Young .
